settings.heading: Raleigh March Madness Meal Kits
settings.text:
Like any basketball fanatic, you want your March Madness gathering to be a slam dunk. But to truly impress guests, you’ll need to spend hours in the kitchen preparing restaurant-quality appetizers and snacks, right? Not necessarily.

When you partner with Table & Twine, we handle the chopping and sautéing so you can focus on what matters most: your team. Our March Madness meal kits in Raleigh include all the ingredients you need to snack your way through halftime.

settings.heading: How Our March Madness Meal Kits Work
settings.text:
This basketball season, forget the microwavable pizza rolls and store-bought chips. Instead, opt for more elevated fare from Table & Twine. The chef-inspired dishes included in our March Madness meal kit are super delicious but also convenient. Some require just 15 minutes to prepare.

The Raleigh March Madness food package is also designed to travel so your food will taste fresh and delicious come game time. This year, our menu includes [insert description].

settings.title: Less Prep and Cleanup Time
settings.text: With queso to stir and chicken wings to sauce, it’s hard to watch the big game. But when you choose March Madness at-home catering in Raleigh, you’ll never miss the jump ball. Since our talented chefs prepare 90% of your meal, you won’t need to waste hours planning, shopping, and chopping. Plus, after the game, you’ll have minimal mess.

settings.title: Delicious, Fan-Worthy Recipes
settings.text: Together, we’ll create a restaurant-quality meal that will please any palette. These recipes take inspiration from the classic flavors you would expect from a stadium concession fan. However, rather than dish up soggy nachos, our talented chefs elevate these flavors with fresh, seasonal produce and sustainably-sourced proteins.

settings.title: A Lasting Impression
settings.text: As catering professionals, we know no party is complete without good food. That’s why we have developed a March Madness meal package that includes all the fixings for a rowdy night in. From artfully-crafted dips to savory sliders, we’ll equip you with the appetizers needed to make a lasting impression.

settings.heading: Why Choose a March Madness Meal Kit?
settings.text: If you enjoy good food but need some help preparing it, you’ll love Table & Twine’s March Madness meal kit. Other benefits of ordering this package include:

settings.title: How much time is required to prepare the food in my March Madness meal kit?
settings.text: Don't spend your whole morning whipping up game-day snacks. Instead, spend one to two hours preparing restaurant-quality appetizers with Table & Twine’s March Madness meal kit.

settings.title: How far in advance do I need to order my March Madness meal kit?
settings.text: If you want to win over guests, place an order for your March Madness meal kit by [date]. Afterward, crack open a beer and let us do the rest.

settings.title: Can I customize my March Madness meal kit?
settings.text: The March Madness meal kit is not customizable. Our chefs carefully curate this package so that there’s a special treat for everyone.
